statements: UPDATE inventory_tracking SET current_stock = 50, restock_threshold = 20 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory_tracking SET product_name = 'Tablet', current_stock = 75 WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE inventory_tracking SET current_stock = current_stock + 10 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory_tracking SET restock_threshold = 50, current_stock = 100 WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE Inventory SET current_stock = 50 WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE RestockAlert SET alert_message = 'Low stock alert' WHERE product_id = '234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Inventory SET current_stock = current_stock - 1 WHERE id = '1a8e34bc-e241-4f49-868d-e37be6e6bb2a';
UPDATE RestockAlert SET alert_message = 'Low stock, please restock soon' WHERE product_id = '2a6f8d2d-4e3e-4c7e-a38c-34b3c595bb43';
UPDATE inventory SET stock_level = stock_level + 10 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE restock_alerts SET alert_message = 'Low stock alert' WHERE product_id = 3 AND alert_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
UPDATE inventory SET stock_level = stock_level - 5 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE restock_alerts SET alert_message = 'Need to restock soon' WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE inventory_items SET item_name = 'Laptop', quantity = 50 WHERE item_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE restock_history SET restock_date = '2022-10-15', restock_quantity = 20 WHERE history_id = '98765432-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE inventory_items SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE item_id = 'f7c49790-8b9e-4b47-bb12-2ccc178e97f6';

UPDATE inventory_items SET stock_level = stock_level - 5 WHERE item_id = 101;
UPDATE restock_alerts SET alert_message = 'Item restocked successfully' WHERE item_id = 201 AND alert_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory_items SET stock_level = stock_level - 5 WHERE item_id = 101;
UPDATE restock_history SET restock_amount = restock_amount + 10, restock_datetime = '2022-01-15' WHERE item_id = 201;
